title: The Cultural Connoisseur
personality_description: This individual possesses a sophisticated and open mindset, valuing history, complexity, and aesthetic depth over fleeting trends.

financial_prediction.rationale: They prefer assets with history and prestige.
specific_assets: Blue-chip dividend stocks (e.g., Coca-Cola, J.P. Morgan)

title: The Tech & Thrill Seeker
personality_description: High in sensation-seeking and mechanically inclined, this person enjoys performance, adrenaline, and complex digital systems.

financial_prediction.rationale: They are comfortable with risk if the performance upside is high.

title: The Social Optimist
personality_description: A highly extroverted and stable individual who thrives on social connection and maintains a generally positive, energetic outlook on life.

financial_prediction.rationale: They invest in things that facilitate connection and enjoyment.

title: The Anxious Observer
personality_description: This profile suggests a higher sensitivity to threats (neuroticism); they are likely cautious, vigilant, and hyper-aware of risks in their environment.

financial_prediction.rationale: They prioritize safety and protection against 'black swan' events.

title: The Status Strategist
personality_description: An image-conscious individual who understands social hierarchy and views appearance and networking as essential tools for success.

financial_prediction.rationale: They understand brand equity and social signaling.

title: The Romantic Dreamer
personality_description: An imaginative and empathetic person who often prefers idealism, narrative, and emotional resonance over cold, hard logic.

financial_prediction.rationale: They buy into the vision and the narrative rather than just the balance sheet.

title: The Prudent Planner
personality_description: Highly conscientious and organized, this person values structure, dutifully meets obligations, and always has a long-term strategy.

financial_prediction.rationale: They want predictable, steady compounding without drama.

title: The Counter-Culture Rebel
personality_description: Non-conformist and intense, this individual likely questions authority and possesses a high tolerance for chaos or aggressive expression.

financial_prediction.rationale: They like betting against the system or finding value in rejected sectors.

title: The Empirical Analyst
personality_description: An analytical thinker who values objective truth, the scientific method, and education; they trust data over intuition.

financial_prediction.rationale: They invest in innovation that can be proven and measured.
